tech_news.title: Nintendo Shares Plunge 10% After Weak Profit Spurs Margin Fears - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Nintendo Co.’s shares slid their most in 18 months after the company reported disappointing earnings, revealing a big hit to margins while concerns grow about the impact of soaring memory chip prices in 2026.
